content: That's a great point about balancing the richness of the dessert with the luxury of the gift. I think I'll add a scoop of vanilla ice cream to the lava cakes to provide a nice contrast. By the way, I also got my mom a customized photo album from Shutterfly for her anniversary, and it turned out really nice. It cost around $50 and was a great way to preserve some of our favorite family memories.
